channel.title: Comments on: NYX Cosmetics Matte Lipstick in Indie Flick

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/nyx-cosmetics-matte-lipstick-indie-flick/#comment-381">Suzi</a>.
I meant to say I love that lipstick too! It's pretty nice.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

I meant to say I love that lipstick too! It’s pretty nice.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/nyx-cosmetics-matte-lipstick-indie-flick/#comment-381">Suzi</a>.
I'm going to get that Milk thing! I have one of the UD lipsticks, I just haven't done the post yet. I'm lazy!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

I’m going to get that Milk thing! I have one of the UD lipsticks, I just haven’t done the post yet. I’m lazy!

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description:
I'm also just starting to open my mind to the possibilities of NYX...bought my first few things from them today, a Wonder Pencil, blush, and their "Milk" eye pencil, supposedly the holy grail base if you want your colored eyeshadow to pop like crazy. Didn't grab any lipstick though...maybe a return trip is in order?
I did get a sample today of Urban Decay's new Revolution Lipstick with my Sephora order. They sent me "Catfight" and I think I'm in love. I have never used a lipstick I like better than this.
item.content:encoded:
I’m also just starting to open my mind to the possibilities of NYX…bought my first few things from them today, a Wonder Pencil, blush, and their “Milk” eye pencil, supposedly the holy grail base if you want your colored eyeshadow to pop like crazy. Didn’t grab any lipstick though…maybe a return trip is in order?

I did get a sample today of Urban Decay’s new Revolution Lipstick with my Sephora order. They sent me “Catfight” and I think I’m in love. I have never used a lipstick I like better than this.

item.title: By: Erin-Kurley
item.dc:creator: Erin-Kurley
item.description: I'll be your pale redheaded canvas any day! (That came out creepier than it was in my head.)
item.content:encoded: I’ll be your pale redheaded canvas any day! (That came out creepier than it was in my head.)
